channel.title: MYB

item.description: “Ease” isn’t the same as “easy.” In fact, they’re often at odds. Easy work is hardly worth our effort. It can deaden us instead of giving us the chanc...

item.title: New Google Leak Reveals Much-Needed Google Photos Video Update
item.description: Google is testing a big update for Google Photos that could dramatically improve thhe experience of video playback and navigation within the app.

item.title: 9 Things All Enterprises Should Be Asking Of Their SaaS Vendors
item.description: Be sure to consider these nine core requirements when evaluating a vendor for your business needs.
